action.msg: MAN, I really dig your flow. How do you manage to keep such a steady voice while holding a chainsaw?
So... you're just... gonna leave her here?
Why not? It's obvious that she'll do a lot more good here than terrifying random people in some far off building.
What do you say, uh- did I ever get your name?
Well anyways. You want this church?
Wait, you're just gonna give her the WHOLE church?
If she can take it from me.
I still don't like the feel of this.
Things should be okay. You know Taki, you aren't that bad honestly.
